backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (User, Post, Reaction, InviteCode), state maps, and all backend functions for user registration, post creation/editing/deletion, reactions, invite code management, and admin operations.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference for the project's frontend architecture and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with all application routes (login, signup, dashboard, create, posts, community, admin) wrapped in a Layout, QueryClientProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component with a tabbed interface for managing public posts, members, invite codes, and post history, with a back-navigation button to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminInviteCodes: Admin invite codes panel that lists unused and used codes, supports adding custom codes, generating random codes, revoking codes, and copying shareable signup links to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublicPosts: Admin component that displays all public posts sorted by newest-first with emotion badges, truncated user IDs, reaction counts, and a confirmation dialog for permanent post deletion.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserManagem: Admin component that lists all users in an accordion, allowing admins to suspend/unsuspend users and change their subscription status.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserPostHis: Admin component that searches for posts by principal ID and displays them with the option to delete individual posts.
frontend/src/components/EmotionBadge.tsx: Small presentational component that renders a styled badge for a given EmotionType (confess, broke, happy).
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying the copyright year and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, authenticated navigation links (including admin if applicable), user pseudonym display, and a sign-out button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wrapper layout component that composes Header, main content area, and Footer into a full-page flex column.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card component for a user's own post supporting inline editing, deletion, and toggling public/private visibility with subscription gating.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostCard.t: Read-only card for community posts that displays content, emotion badge, and allows authenticated non-owners to add a single reaction.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionBann: Alert banner shown when a user's subscription is expired, displaying region-specific renewal pricing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated (or anonymous) backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, admin status, subscription status, and posts via the actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes including emotion and status color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only page that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users and renders the AdminDashboard component for authorized admins.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityFeedPage.tsx: Authenticated page that displays all public posts sorted by creation date, redirecting unauthenticated or unregistered users.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main authenticated dashboard where users select an emotion to create a post, with subscription status checks and an expired-subscription banner.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that triggers Internet Identity authentication and redirects users to the dashboard or signup flow based on their profile status.
frontend/src/pages/MyPostsPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's posts in reverse chronological order, redirecting to login or signup if unauthenticated or unregistered. Shows a loading spinner, empty state with a link to create a post, or a list of PostCard components.
frontend/src/pages/PostCreationPage.tsx: Renders the post creation form with emotion type selection, a textarea with live word count, and validation enforcing a 24-word minimum for Confess/Happy emotions. Submits via the createPost mutation and redirects to /posts on success.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Invite-only registration form collecting pseudonym, region, and invite code, with pre-fill support from URL/sessionStorage. Redirects unauthenticated users to login and already-registered users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/subscriptionHelpers.t: Provides helper functions to check subscription status (active/grace), determine post/public visibility permissions, and return regional pricing and human-readable status labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for extracting URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive parameters from the URL without a page reload.
frontend/src/utils/wordCounter.ts: Exports a 24-word minimum constant and utility functions to count words in a string, check if the minimum is met, and determine whether a given emotion type requires a minimum word count.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom serif/sans fonts, OKLCH-based semantic color tokens (including emotion and status variants), border radius variables, and soft box shadows. Includes the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state for Veil (version 27), documenting the platform summary, architectural decisions, known issues, and a list of existing implemented features with their requirement IDs.
